createChallengesDesc: Design and upload your own CTF challenges for others to solve.
launchInstancesDesc: Instantly deploy and access challenge environments with one click.
trackProgressDesc: Monitor your solving progress and compete on the leaderboard.
signUpDesc: Create your account and join the community.
chooseChallengeDesc: Browse and select from a variety of CTF challenges.
solveSubmitDesc: Launch the challenge, find the flags, and submit your solution.
earnPointsDesc: Gain points, level up, and climb the leaderboard.
